subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Donald Young reached his first ATP semifinal by beating No. 7-seeded Marcos Baghdatis, 6-3, 7-6 (4), at the Legg Mason Tennis Classic in Washington.
snippet: Donald Young reached his first ATP semifinal by beating No. 7-seeded Marcos Baghdatis, 6-3, 7-6 (4), at the Legg Mason Tennis Classic in Washington.
